item.title: CVE-2024-23516|2024-02-10T08:11:58.971Z -- Calculators World -- CC BMI Calculator
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Calculators World CC BMI Calculator allows Stored XSS.This issue affects CC BMI Calculator: from n/a through 2.0.1.
